tests.name: Heart Rate
tests.instruction: Place your thumb gently on the green light. Stay still.

tests.name: Heart Rate Variability (HRV)
tests.instruction: Keep your thumb gently on the green light. Breathe normally.

tests.name: Pulse Alert
tests.result: Alert: Heart rate above safe range.

tests.name: Resting Heart Report
tests.result: Your resting heart rate today: {value} BPM.

tests.name: Posture Monitor
tests.instruction: Sit upright. Device will buzz if you slouch.

tests.name: Workout / Fitness Test
tests.instruction: Walk for 2 minutes with device. Keep moving.

tests.name: High-Impact / Sudden Movement
tests.instruction: Device checks if your movement is safe.

tests.name: Walking Balance (Gait Check)
tests.instruction: Walk for 30 seconds. Device will check your steps.
tests.result: Your walking is steady ✅ / Your walking is uneven ⚠️

tests.name: Fall Detection
tests.result: Fall detected! Do you need help?

tests.name: Impact Alert
tests.result: Strong impact detected. Are you okay?

tests.name: Finger Mobility
tests.instruction: Tap the pad as fast as you can, 10 times.

tests.name: Hand Coordination
tests.instruction: When you feel vibration, tap the pad quickly.

tests.name: Grip Strength (Hold Test)
tests.instruction: Press and hold the pad. Release when you can’t hold anymore.
